summary: The story behind Hitler's plan of Germany getting the atomic bomb during WW2, and the heavy water sabotages in Rjukan, Norway, seen from four angles, the German side, the allied, the saboteurs and the company side.
cast: Andreas Döhler|Robert Hunger-Bühler|Marc Ben Puch|Christoph Bach|Peri Baumeister|Espen Reboli Bjerke|Torstein Bjørklund|Ole Christoffer Ertvaag|Eirik Evjen|Anna Friel|Ragnhild H. Myntevik|Benjamin Helstad|Espen Klouman Høiner|Endre Joner Oftebro Ellefsen|Frank Kjosås|Rolf Kristian Larsen|Mads Sjøgård Pettersen|Søren Pilmark|Christian Rubeck|Maibritt Saerens|Audun Sandem|Tobias Santelmann|Dennis Storhøi|Pip Torrens|Stein Winge|David Zimmerschied|Julia Schacht|Clara Lien Sunde|Elg Elgesem|Corey Johnson|Uwe Preuss|Bjørn Iversen|Glenn Andre Kaada|Thomas Wehling|Dominique Guillo|Bo Alexander Hallan|Jim High|Damian Odess-Gillett|Zdenek Pecha|Ingeborg Raustøl|Øyvind Mørk
title: Operación Telemark
